name: terminal
description_long: A network of pneumatic tubes for passenger travel. Although there does not appear to have been any passengers lately. Kind of lonely here, really.
Sympathizer: Some things can be 'use'd to invoke some kind of reaction. Try using, well, 'use' on the pachinko machine.
It's really more of a gachapon machine though.
description_short: The end of the line of the pneumatic tube transport system
